fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Distort time at night, causing 203 days to pass overnight.
- Timeshift a player at night. If they have a role from the first 500 roles, they're converted to a random role from the most recent 500 roles, and vice versa.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - The first time each player posts a role in <#970046125065265202> during the timespan of this game, they get a roleblock immunity autovest.
